titles.title: A resolution designating April 5, 2012, as "Gold Star Wives Day".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 4/17/2012--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates April 5, 2012, as Gold Star Wives Day. Honors and recognizes the contributions of the members of the Gold Star Wives of America, Inc., and their dedication to the members and veterans of the Armed Forces. Encourages the people of the United States to observe Gold Star Wives Day.
